announcements.title: NSYSU Course Selector Helper V6
announcements.description:
This is an auxiliary system for course selection, **for reference only**.

Course data updates every hour, **please ensure you manually refresh the page to get the updated data**.
updates: New: Whole day filter for course time
New: Button to quickly copy course ID
Change: Time filter now applies to all courses
Change: Always show tags if they exist
Change: Fixed table header for schedule
features: Auto-fill script for school course selection system
Local Storage auto-saves selection data when browser closes
knownIssues: Safari browser may have rendering issues. Please contact us if you encounter any rendering errors and note your browser version. (If you're willing to be a tester, please mention you want to be an iOS frontend tester in the form, much appreciated)
If you experience any lag, please fill out the feedback form and note the location.
Course data is static data crawled from the web, updated every hour. Those interested in using this API can refer to [NSYSU Course Open API](https://github.com/nsysu-opendev/NSYSUCourseAPI)
